column4: anyone else have an issue with their front audio port not working?
Not really, but I've had issues with sound cards, if that's what you mean
If I'm not mistaken, it happened to me once, but it was a bit of a different case; Ubuntu and Windows were installed on separate drives
Pardon me, but I think Sarthor said he removed some partitions from his disk. Might that confuse GRUB if the partitions change?
